title: HTML formatting issue in fmt pkg doc
body:
by **patrick.phalen**: 
In http://golang.org/pkg/fmt/, the following section lacks proper HTML formatting, so
that the list of items runs together:

%p is not implemented %T is not implemented %e %E %f %F %g %g are all equivalent and
scan any floating point or complex value %s and %v on strings scan a space-delimited
token

in doc.go within $GOROOT/go/src/pkg/fmt, it looks like this:

%p is not implemented
%T is not implemented
%e %E %f %F %g %G are all equivalent and scan any floating p    oint or complex value
%s and %v on strings scan a space-delimited token
